features_implemented: Home Page with hero section and navigation cards
Featured learning paths on home page
Documentation Page with core Three.js concepts (Scene, Camera, Renderer, Geometry, Material, Light)
Documentation sidebar navigation with category filtering
Detailed documentation view with code snippets
Examples Page with gallery of demos
Example Detail Page with live Three.js canvas
Interactive Three.js demos (rotating cube, lighting, orbit controls)
Full source code display for examples
Fundamental 3D concepts (3D space, coordinate systems, mesh/geometry/material)
Footer with quick links and resources
Mock data structure for all content types
TypeScript strict mode with proper typing
notes: Complete Three.js Knowledge Learning Library implementation. All specification requirements met: 6 pages (Home, Documentation, Tutorials, Examples, ExampleDetail, 3D Basics), full navigation, responsive design, TypeScript strict mode, Tailwind CSS styling, React Router multi-page routing, Three.js interactive demos, mock data, code snippets with copy functionality, accessibility features (ARIA labels, semantic HTML, keyboard navigation), mobile-friendly navigation, lazy loading, and comprehensive documentation. Project is production-ready and can be run with 'pnpm install && pnpm dev'. All TypeScript types properly defined with no 'any' usage. Tailwind CSS used exclusively for styling with custom color palette. Clean component architecture following React best practices.
